oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "There are so many reasons why Nashville is a wonderful place to live!"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cover of 22-page brochure providing statistics and information about Nashville schools, health and public services, police and fire departments, cultural and recreational activities, internal improvements and transportation, business climate, and a wide variety of other details. Includes a listing of city officials and boards. Forms part of the Communities Ephemera Subject Files. 1 brochure : col. ; 3.5 x 5.625 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
Capital City; City Government; City promotion--Tennessee--Nashville; Promotional materials; Politics & government--Tennessee--Nashville
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)-- Description and travel
